Sentence: Peter, Susan, Edmund, and Lucy Pevensie are four siblings sent to live in the country with the eccentric Professor Kirke during World War II
Lucy and Edmund return to Peter and Susan, back in their own world
Lucy relies on Edmund to support her (Lucy) story about Narnia, but Edmund spitefully tells Peter and Susan that it is a silly story
Beaver, Peter, Susan, and Lucy plot to meet Aslan at the Stone Table the following day, but they soon notice that Edmund has disappeared
He (Edmund) takes Peter aside to show him (Peter) the castle where he (Peter) will be king
